faqs.question: Czy obcokrajowcy mogą kupić nieruchomość w Hiszpanii?
faqs.answer: Yes, non-Spanish citizens can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You'll need an NIE (foreigner identification number) and can obtain mortgages through Spanish banks or international lenders. Most Spanish property transactions for foreigners proceed smoothly with proper legal representation. Professional advisors in Mutxamel specialise in international purchases and understand expatriate requirements.

faqs.question: Jakie są koszty zakupu nieruchomości w Hiszpanii?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, budget approximately 10-12% for additional costs: 6-8% transfer tax, legal fees (1-2%), notary fees (0.5%), and registration fees (0.5-1%). Ongoing costs include annual property tax (0.4-1.1% of cadastral value), community fees if applicable, and optional buildings insurance. These costs are transparent and well-understood by Spanish legal professionals.
